attributes.action: give agency workers the same rights as perminent employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who work through agencies have very few rights, there has been papers drawn up in the european parliment to try and resolve those issues however this has been shelved and agency workers are not receiving the same rights as perminent employees such as equal pay we need something on the lines of the Temporary Agency Workers Directive introduced whether it be just the uk or all europe

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give agency workers the same rights as perminent employees."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11294.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Agency-Justice/
